::FZ::

FZ nods. "Yes, you were killed in the fight against the Alliance, but 
we brought you back. The Mafia and the Alliance are allied now, so we 
are not here as enemies."

> Beholder 2: Didn't I...die? I got blown up, and went to a weird 
place, I
> don't remember anything past that, though...
